Guidelines Policy Circular No_ 18.72/2021 dated 31st August, 2021 (Decision taken File No: NHAI/CMD/ Misc/2021/2 Computer No: 99627) Sub.: Consolidated Instruction regarding Global Tender Enquiry (GTE) under Rule 161 (iv) of General Financial Rules (GFRs) 2017 upto Rs. 200 Crores MoRTH vide Letter No. NH-35014/20/2020-H dated 07.07.2021 has forwarded a copy of Department of Expenditure's OM No. F.4/1/2021-PPD dated 30.06.2021 on the above subject. A copy of the same is attached herewith for information and compliance. 2 . This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. Silg/1021 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.)
